name: haltija-desktop
description: Haltija Desktop - God Mode Browser for AI Agents

scripts.start: cd ../.. && bun run build && cd apps/desktop && electron .
scripts.sync-version: node -e "const root = require('../../package.json'); const pkg = require('./package.json'); pkg.version = root.version; require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2) + '\n')"
scripts.prebuild: npm run sync-version && npm run icons && npm run compile:server
scripts.compile:server: cd ../.. && bun run build && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 src/server.ts --outfile apps/desktop/resources/haltija-server-arm64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 src/server.ts --outfile apps/desktop/resources/haltija-server-x64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 bin/hj.mjs --outfile apps/desktop/resources/hj-arm64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 bin/hj.mjs --outfile apps/desktop/resources/hj-x64 && cp dist/component.js apps/desktop/resources/component.js && cp haltija-icon.svg apps/desktop/resources/icon.svg
scripts.compile:server:linux: cd ../.. && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 src/server.ts --outfile apps/desktop/resources/haltija-server-x64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 src/server.ts --outfile apps/desktop/resources/haltija-server-arm64
scripts.build:mac: npm run sync-version && npm run icons && npm run compile:server && electron-builder --mac
scripts.build:win: npm run sync-version && npm run compile:server:win && electron-builder --win
scripts.build:linux: npm run sync-version && npm run compile:server:linux && electron-builder --linux
